attr.title: Waking Mars
attr.desc: Waking Mars is a one-of-a-kind adventure in which you jetpack through subterranean Mars encountering a host of extraordinary alien lifeforms that operate as a living, breathing ecosystem.
attr.inst:
Add your Linux (humble) game files from the WakingMars-1.2.1-Linux.tar.gz tarball to the /roms/wakingmars/gamedata folder (you will need to create the gamedata folder if it does not exist).

File structure:
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/GameData/
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/lib/
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars.png

On some platforms you may need to run the port script (/roms/ports/Waking Mars.sh) from Options->File Manager in order to prevent the game from segfaulting whilst it starts.
